title: WHY IS GAS HIGHER HERE IN WILMINGTON THAN OTHER PLACES IN NC.  I JUST CAME THRU WINSTON SALEM WHERE GAS IS SELLING FOR 253, GREENSBORO 249. GAS IS SELLING FOR 269 HERE IN TOWN.  SOUNDS LIKE WE ARE GEING CHEATED BY GAS SUPPLIES.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=3214
